column4: Hey.  I created an extra partition on another hard drive.  How do I format it with reiserfs.

Is there a way to mount two different partitions to /home?  I'm running out of space for my /home partition, and I have an entirely seperate hard drive for extra space.  I set up a partition on it, and I'm about to format it.
no, but you should be able to mount the seperate drive within your home directory....
Yea I figured I could.  burner:  Well, I'm sure developers could figure out a way. ;)
